#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
long long pow(int b){
	if(b<1) return 1;
	else{
		long long x=pow(b/2)%10000007;
		if(b%2==0) return (x*x)%10000007;
		else return (x*x*2)%10000007;
	}
}
int main(){
	short t;
	int n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>n;
		if(n%2==1){
			cout<<pow(n)-1<<endl;
		}
		else cout<<pow(n)+1<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
